definition: performed or occurring as a result of a sudden inner impulse or inclination
sentence: Their spontaneous road trip turned into an unforgettable adventure.

definition: a remark or statement that has been used too often to be interesting or thoughtful
sentence: His speech was filled with platitudes that failed to inspire the audience.

definition: emitting light as a result of being heated; passionate or brilliant
sentence: The incandescent light bulb brightened the entire room.

definition: a position requiring little or no work but giving the holder status or financial benefit
sentence: He landed a sinecure in the government that allowed him to travel the world.

definition: the appearance of being true or real
sentence: The novel's attention to detail gave it a sense of verisimilitude.

definition: an act of speaking one's thoughts aloud when alone or regardless of any hearers
sentence: The character's soliloquy revealed his inner struggles.

definition: bad handwriting; a spelling or grammatical mistake
sentence: His notes were full of cacography, making them hard to read.
The pulchritude of the landscape took her breath away.
His triskaidekaphobia kept him from participating in any events on the 13th.

definition: of doubtful authenticity, although widely circulated as being true
sentence: The story of the haunted house was likely apocryphal.
